snippet: Morgan Stanley served as lead underwriter for the initial public offerings of Zynga and LinkedIn and is a shareholder in both companies as well.
abstract: Morgan Stanley served as lead underwriter for the initial public offerings of Zynga and LinkedIn and is a shareholder in both companies as well.
lead_paragraph: Morgan Stanley, as of late the go-to underwriter for tech initial public offerings, disclosed its stakes in Zynga and LinkedIn on Friday, according to securities filings.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Discloses Stakes in Zynga and LinkedIn
